document.name: CGeneralSettingsGroup
document.title: الاعدادات العامة
document.text: Shareaza's اعدادات اهلا بك في مدير
The Shareaza Settings Manager allows advanced users to completely customise how Shareaza works. The settings in the
عام
الجزء مخصص للمستخدمين المحترفين.
Common user interface settings like tooltips, minimise behaviour, number formats, prompts, etc.
تحتوي المكتبة على ملفات الخاصة و الملفات التي قيد التحميل.
عندما وأين يستعمل مركز Shareaza مشغل الوسائط.
ملف الاعدادات الخاص بك و مراسله منتدى الدعم الفني.
Integrate Shareaza with your web browser to accept peer-to-peer links and download content.

document.name: CInternetSettingsGroup
document.title: الانترنت
document.text: Shareaza's اهلا بك في مدير اعدادات
The Shareaza Settings Manager allows advanced users to completely customise how Shareaza works. The settings in the
انترنت
section control how Shareaza interacts with other nodes within distributed peer-to-peer networks.
قابليات وسرعات اتصالك بالانترنت.
Download throughput, scheduling, verification, timeouts and management.
Upload capacity, queuing, banning, timeouts and special requests.
Set up the ability to control Shareaza remotely through a web browser.

document.name: CBrowseHostProfile.2
document.text: ملفات المشاركة

document.name: DownloadHelp.Select
document.text: رجاء حدد التحميل
This is where files currently being downloaded are displayed. You can view individual sources by expanding each file with the small + on the left.
You can also use this command to get help information on a specific download. Simply select a download and choose this command again.

document.name: DownloadHelp.Completed
document.text: هذا التحميل أكمل
تحميل هذا الملف Shareaza انهاء, وتحقق انه صحيح 100% الان انقل ملفك الى مجلد البرامج في المكتبة.

document.name: DownloadHelp.Moving
document.text: هذا التحميل يتحرك
تحميل الملف Shareaza انهى, وتم التاكد انه صحيح. والان سوف يتم نقل الى مجلد البرامج في المكتبة.

document.name: DownloadHelp.Paused
document.text: هذا التحميل متوقّف
هذا التحميل أوقف. اذا اردت ان يستمر في التحميل , اضغط على
متابعة التحميل
command.

document.name: DownloadHelp.DiskFull
document.text: مساحة الهارديك ممتلئ

أوقف Shareaza هذا التحميل آليا لأن القرص الصلب يبدو كاملا، أو ملف التحميل لا يمكن أن يكتب إلى. إذا تتمنّى الإستمرار بتحميل، رجاء حرّر بعض الفضاء على قرصك الصلب و/ أو دقّقا لتأكيد حافظة الملف الناقصة سهلة الوصول، وبعد ذلك يستأنف التحميل.

document.name: DownloadHelp.Verifying
document.text: هذا التحميل يحقّق
هذا التحميل أنهى, وShareaza يدقّقه الآن لضمان بأنّه بالضبط تماما مثل الملف الأصلي. إذا أيّ أجزاء متضرّرة وجد، Shareaza سيصلّحهم آليا.

document.name: DownloadHelp.Downloading
document.text: هذا التحميل نشيط!
هذا التحميل حاليا مستمرّ. اذا كان التحميل بطي, بامكانك البحث عن مصادر اكبر من الشبكة
ايجاد المزيد من المصادر
هذا الامر. إذا السرعة لا تتحسّنها قد ينتظر أن تحدّد سرعة ارسال المستعملين التي أنت تحمّل من تزيد سرعة تحميل عادة بمرور الوقت.

document.name: DownloadHelp.Pending
document.text: This Download is Pending

This download is waiting for someone to start uploading. Shareaza is ready to start downloading this file, but no-one is sending it at the moment. You are probably waiting in other user's queues, and the download may start transfering at any time. You can examine the individual sources to see each queue you are waiting in. If you are sharing files yourself, it may improve the chances of a download transfer starting quickly.

document.name: DownloadHelp.Queued
document.text: This Download is Queued

This download is waiting for some of your other downloads to complete. Your download settings limit the number of downloads which may be active at any given time, to ensure that each download gets a good share of the available bandwidth. You can change these settings via Tools, Shareaza Settings. Alternatively, you may manually start this download with the resume command.

document.name: DownloadHelp.Searching
document.text: This Download is Searching

There are no known sources for this download, so Shareaza is searching all connected P2P networks for new sources. Once sources are found, the download will start automatically. Shareaza searches for sources automatically, however you can speed up the process using the
Find More Sources
command.

Unfortunately in many cases there may be no users online who have the file you are looking for. The only course of action here is to wait for someone to come online, or cancel it and try to find a similar file which is more widely available.

document.name: DownloadHelp.Creating
document.text: This Download is Creating
Shareaza is pre-allocating a file in which to store this download, to save time later.

document.name: DownloadHelp.Tracker
document.text: BitTorrent Tracker Down
The BitTorrent tracker server for this download appears to be down or malfunctioning. Shareaza is unable to contact it to receive a list of downloader peers.

document.name: UploadHelp
document.text: Uploads Area
This is where queues and uploads are displayed. You can expand each queue with the small + on the left, and filter what is displayed with the button on the right of the window's toolbar.

document.name: GeneralHelp.DiskSpace
document.text: Disk Space is Low
The amount of free space on one or more drives used by Shareaza is low.

You should always attempt to keep a reasonable amount of disk space free. Programs can become unstable if the drives become full, and temporary files may be lost. You should run a disk clean-up, delete unwanted files, or un-install software you no longer need.

document.name: GeneralHelp.DiskWriteFail
document.text: A Required Directory is Non-writable
A disk or directory Shareaza needs cannot be written to.
A network drive may have been disconnected, or you may not have write permission to a selected directory. Please check directories and permissions, or change the temporary files location.

document.name: GeneralHelp.ConnectionFail
document.text: Internet Connection Has Been Lost
Windows reports that there is no internet connection is available.
It is likely that a modem or router has dropped, meaning the internet cannot be accessed. You may need to manually re-connect or reset your connection.
Shareaza has ceased connection attempts to avoid losing all cached hosts.

document.name: GeneralHelp.XPsp2
document.text: Half open connection limit detected
Shareaza has detected Windows XP Service Pack 2 (or a similar environment). This restricts the number of connections that applications can attempt at once.

Shareaza has limited network connections and set appropriate default values to ensure proper operation, however performance may be slightly reduced. Please visit the Shareaza forums for further information, and up to date news.

document.name: GeneralHelp.AdultFilter
document.text: Adult content filter enabled
Please note that (as with any automated filter) it may not be 100% effective at screening content. It is designed simply to filter out excess unwanted results, rather than as a 100% safe block.
Children's Internet use (including P2P file sharing) should always be under parental supervision.

document.name: GeneralHelp.BadTorrentEncoding
document.text: This torrent appears to have an encoding error

Windows has reported a translation fault while decoding text in this torrent. It is possible that the torrent is corrupt, or just incorrectly encoded. The torrent may still download properly, although some file names could be incorrect.
Most torrent creation programs should allow you to repair this torrent, which will ensure it works properly in all BitTorrent applications.
, or to download software to repair the torrent.

document.name: GeneralHelp.DonkeyServerList
document.text: Your eDonkey server list is empty
There are no servers in your eDonkey2000 server list. You need to download an up to date server list (met file) to connect to ED2K.
You can download a server list from the ed2k setting page, or the discovery services window. (Press F9 to open the discovery services window)

document.name: GeneralHelp.UploadWarning
document.text: Limiting uploads may slow downloads
Several networks Shareaza connects to enforce ratios, limit uploads to clients that do not share, or simply preference uploading to known sharers.

Fortunately, broadband DSL connections are like a two-lane highway: you have separate allocations for upload and download. If your client is properly configured, you should be able to upload at a good rate while retaining full download capacity.
By default, your upload limit is set to about 85% of available upstream bandwidth, while downloads are unlimited. That configuration should give you the fastest possible downloads that are available.

document.name: SearchHelp.BadSearch1
document.text: Please re-phrase the search

This search is poorly formatted, and may not function correctly. Searches should include several terms where possible, and should specify a schema (file type). Furthermore, searches must not be limited to numbers or negative terms only, and you should avoid overly general queries.
Most clients on the network will ignore a search for all MP3 files, for example, because it is not specific enough, and would generate too many results.

document.name: SearchHelp.BadSearch2
document.text: Please re-phrase the search
This search does not contain enough terms to function properly. All searches need a minimum number of valid, alphabetic characters to be able to start.

While common file extentions (and numbers) can be searched for, you must enter other terms as well when creating the search. Punctuation and wildcards are not used in searches, just the text you enter.

document.name: SearchHelp.BadSearch3
document.text: Please re-phrase the search
This search seems to contain only common file extentions, or no searchable words.
If you are having trouble creating searches, keep in mind that it's quite similar to a web search. Specific terms or phrases are best- Unique names, titles and keywords.
General terms cannot be searched for efficiently and may result in poor search performance, as well as high bandwidth use during searches.
Further help is available on the Shareaza web site.

document.name: SearchHelp.AdultSearch
document.text: This search cannot be started
The specified search would probably return a large number of results with adult content, and this has been turned off in the settings. You should either re-phrase the search, or disable the filter.
To disable the filter, go into Tools > Settings > General and un-check the adult content filter.

document.name: ShareHelp.AlreadyShared
document.text: Already Shared
The folder you have selected is already being shared as part of an existing share.
%s

document.name: ShareHelp.BadShare
document.text: This folder should not be shared
This folder is (or contains) a system folder. Sharing this folder is not recommended, since most of the files in it are of no use to other people.
Folders such as the Windows directory, Program Files, and similar folders do not usually contain files suitable for sharing. Any files of interest would be in sub-folders located
inside
these folders. Please share those instead.
The Shareaza 'incomplete' folder should also not be shared through the library, since attempting to hash downloads in progress may impact on performance.

Are you sure you want to disconnect?

Forcing your PC into hub mode may have adverse effects on performance and the P2P network It is generally better to allow Shareaza to decide whether or not hub mode should be used.

Hub mode does NOT produce better search results, or have any other advantages for you.

Do you really want to do this, despite these disadvantages?
Disabling support for Gnutella-1 protocols may limit your search results, and if you are acting as a hub it may also impact upon the results of other users. Are you sure you want to do this?
Gnutella2 is Shareaza's premiere network. Disabling support for it may severely limit both the number and quality of your search results. Are you SURE you want to do this?

Including your downloaded files folder in your library makes it easier to view and organise new downloads, and lets you take advantage of advanced Shareaza features such as download verification and automatic upgrading. Placing downloaded files in your library does not necessarily require you to share them: you can choose whether or not to share files independently.

الإستعمال Shareaza لإدارة كلّ برامج الانترنت:
The download manager plugin will only attempt to download file types listed here. Other file types will be handled by your web browser. Shareaza must be running to manage downloads.
حظر الاي بي الخاص بالشبكة المحلية
التحميل والارسال الوحيد إلى الشبكات التي مرتبطة.

Shareaza Remote Access allows you to leave Shareaza running on your PC, and control it remotely using a web browser. You will need to be able to accept incoming connections to use this feature (i.e. properly configured router, etc).

The scheduler is designed to allow you to set times when Shareaza will connect and download files.
Note: If you have Shareaza open while the scheduler is active, you may see it changing settings- This is normal!-

Shareaza is a general-purpose file-sharing application that can access many P2P networks at the same time. On this page you can select which P2P networks you want to connect to, and then adjust specific settings for each network.
The Gnutella2 network is Shareaza's premiere network, offering more features and performance than any other P2P net. Highly recommended.
The eDonkey2000 network is a popular server-based network. While not as feature-rich as Gnutella2, eDonkey2000 has an impressive file collection.
Although the original Gnutella network is less feature-rich than Gnutella2, and has fewer files than eDonkey2000, it remains a valuable resource.
البحث في السيرفرات البعيدة في ذاكرة السيرفر:
من الانترنت eDonkey2000 تحميل قائمة السيرفرات لبرنامج:
Clear downloaded torrents When the share ratio reaches
Enable EndGame mode when completing torrents
او اي برنامج مشاركة هذا المعالج سوف يساعدك على اعداد البرنامج و الاتصال به Shareaza اذا كنت تستخدم برنامج .
لعمل اعدادات الاتصال Shareaza اضغط على خروج واضغط على ادوات ثم اعدادات Shareaza اذا كنت مستخدم محترف اضغط لبرنامج.
اختيار الملفات التي تريد وضع مشاركة لها
واجهتين للمستخدم اختر الواجهة التي تناسبك Shareaza يدعم .
النظام العادي هو واجهة استخدام مبسطة بها قوائم تسهل للمستخدم الوصول الى اي شي بدون اية مشاكل.
النظام المتقدم : هو نظام مخصص لمحترفين حيث انه قائم على النوافذ و الاوامر الى اخره
للحصول على اداء افضل يجب عليك وضع اعداد الاتصال ونوع الاتصال .
( please select )| I am using the Internet at home| I am using the Internet on a college LAN| I am using the Internet on a office LAN| I am using the Internet at a hotel or airport

No, I CAN accept all incoming connections| Yes, so I CANNOT accept incoming connections from the Internet| I don't know, please AUTO-DETECT the firewalled state

No, I have FULL ACCESS to the Internet| Yes, but I will set up port-forwarding for Shareaza| Yes, so I CANNOT accept incoming connections from the Internet| I don't know, please AUTO-DETECT the firewalled state

| Dial up Modem| ISDN| ADSL (256K)| ADSL (512K)| ADSL (768K)| ADSL (1.5M)| ADSL (4.0M)| ADSL2 (8.0M)| ADSL2 (12.0M)| ADSL2+ (24.0M)| Cable Modem/SDSL| T1| T3| LAN| OC3
P2P networks are only as good as the people who use them. All of the content available for download is being shared by another user.
You do not have to share content to use Shareaza, however some software will behave differently to users who are not sharing anything.
Please indicate which folders, if any, you wish to share. Simply click the Add button to add a new folder.
تحذير : توزيع الأعمال المحفوظة الحقوق مخالفة في أكثر البلدان .
Shareaza is a much friendlier place when everyone writes a few basic details about themselves.

Shareaza is a general-purpose file-sharing application that can access many P2P networks at the same time. Here you can select which networks you'd like to access. Note that you can always select different networks later.
The Gnutella2 network is Shareaza's premiere network, offering more features and performance than any other P2P net.
The eDonkey2000 network is a popular server-based network. While not as feature-rich as Gnutella2, eDonkey2000 has an impressive file collection.
Although the original Gnutella network is less feature-rich than Gnutella2, and has fewer files than eDonkey2000, it remains a valuable resource.
Shareaza has detected that you have another eDonkey2000 program installed on your computer. Would you like to import any unfinished downloads into Shareaza?
That's it! Shareaza has been configured to work with your computer.
If you ever need to change your settings, you can re-run this QuickStart wizard by selecting it from the Tools menu.
After closing this wizard by clicking Finish, you can connect to the networks you selected and start searching and downloading content.
اتصل بالشبكة عن الانتهاء من المعالج
عند تشغيل البرنامج Shareaza اتصل بالشبكة
عند تشغيل نظام تشغيل الويندوز Shareaza بداء تشغيل
السماح للاخرين بمشاهده نبذه عن المستخدم
Other Gnutella users browsing your profile and shared files will see your avatar. Custom avatars should be 128x128 pixels, and can be in any supported image file on your PC.
Favourite files are recommended to users who browse your profile. You can create favourite files by adding them to the "Favourites" library folder.

Gnutella users are identified by a globally unique identifier and a corresponding public and private key pair. Normally there is no need to generate a new ID, however Shareaza provides this option for advanced users.
Initiate a new connection to host or server:|Browse this host:
Downloading any file with Shareaza is easy. Simply type or paste the URL or URI describing the file into the box below and press Enter.
Shareaza can download files from the web (HTTP), and automatically search and download P2P links (Magnet, Gnutella, eDonkey2000, mP2P).

Shareaza can also download BitTorrent files. A torrent can be described by an xyz.torrent file, or a HTTP link to the .torrent file. To download a torrent HTTP link, paste it in the box above. If you already have a .torrent file, click Open Torrent:

This is a list of folders in your library. You can add and remove folders using the buttons on the right. When you add a new folder it is initially shared with other users, however you can unshare it from the Shareaza library if you wish.

Did you know Shareaza is a 100% free product?

Shareaza does NOT contain ANY "spyware", "adware" or other bundled software. It does NOT display any advertisements or "popups", ever.{n}{n}If you ever see advertising or "popups" while using Shareaza, be assured that they are NOT coming from this program.
Unfortunately a lot of other software does come with undesirable adware or spyware, so if you see something suspicious you may wish to check your PC with an advertising or spyware removal program.

You should not have had to pay any money to obtain Shareaza. Shareaza can be freely downloaded by anyone from www.shareaza.com. If you paid someone money for Shareaza, you should demand a full refund immediately.
We hope you have enjoyed using Shareaza so far. We believe it is the best file sharing application around.
Unfortunately, a lot of file sharers don't know what they're missing!
If you know someone who would like Shareaza, whether they're a new user or someone still putting up with an inferior product, why not let them know there is a better alternative?
Chances are they'll be grateful you rescued them!
هذا الملف موجود فعلاً في المكتبة . ماذا تريد انت تعمل ؟
سبق وان حملت وحذفت هذا الملف من قبل. ماذا تريد ان تفعل?
هذه اول مره تضغط على زر الاغلاق . رجاء اختر ماذا تريد انت تعمل لكي يتم تطبيقه على جميع الاحوال:
تصغير البرنامج في الاسفل مع امكانية استرجاعه
بعد الانتهاء من تحميل الملفات او الانتهاء من رفع الملفات Shareaza ايقاف
لزيادة سرعة الاتصال eDonkey2000 بامكانك تحميل السيرفرات الجديدية لبرنامج
يمكن للاشيرازا ان يتذكر هذا الملف ويحذرك اذا صادفة في البحث مرة اخرى . رجاء اختر سبب لحذف هذا الملف:
هذا الملف يسمى باسم خطاء . ويمكن ان يكون مظلل.
هذا الملف من النوعية الرديئة جدا.
هذا الملف يوجود به مشاكل او غير صالح للاستعمال.

You have opened a BitTorrent torrent file. Would you like to download its contents, or re-seed it?
To share complete files using BitTorrent they must first be seeded. Once this process is complete the Torrent will appear as a new item in your download list.
